meanings.sent1: She kept mischoosing the wrong answers on the test.
meanings.sent2: He realized he was mischoosing the path to the park.
meanings.sent3: By mischoosing the ingredients, the cake turned out salty instead of sweet.
meanings.sent4: Mischoosing a life partner is like trying to fit a square peg in a round hole.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of mischoosing can lead to unexpected outcomes.

meanings.definition: The act of making a wrong or incorrect choice.
meanings.sent1: His mischoosing of the hotel led to a disappointing vacation.
meanings.sent2: The mischoosing of colors made the painting look unbalanced.
meanings.sent3: The mischoosing of costumes for the play resulted in a hilarious mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The mischoosing of words in the speech caused confusion among the audience.
meanings.sent5: The mischoosing of the winning lottery numbers left him empty-handed.
